thread.section_title: HiFX New Zealand Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of HiFX New Zealand | www.hifx.co.nz
thread.title: Anna Elders
thread.title_full: HiFX New Zealand reviewed by Anna Elders

author: Anna Elders
title: Anna Elders
text: Would thoroughly recommend Hifx as traders in currency exchange. Super bunch of people, obvious great teamwork from people's ability to step up when our lovely Chrissy wasn't available, went the extra mile to ensure things moved through in time and helpful in guiding us on decisions of how to proceed. Thanks Chrissy and Hifx!
